content: I want to modify the X-Frame-Options header set in /etc/nginx/zulip-include/app on my Zulip server. This file is managed by puppet. Is there a recommended way to make modifications other than just changing the file directly?
Assuming puppet only runs when Zulip is upgraded, editing it directly might be easiest for my case
@Reid Barton yes, it only runs on upgrade
So you can just edit and reload nginx
